item.title: Worst violence in Syria since Assad fall as dozens killed in clashes
item.description: A group that has been monitoring the civil war said 71 people died in clashes between the two sides.

item.title: Several dead after UN helicopter shot at in South Sudan
item.description: The shooting during an evacuation mission may constitute a war crime, a UN official says.

item.title: Ros Atkins on... the week after the Oval Office row
item.description: The BBC's Analysis Editor Ros Atkins takes a look at the situation on the ground in Ukraine.

item.title: Paris train services to resume after WW2 bomb defused
item.description: The unexploded bomb was found on tracks near the Gare du Nord on Friday.

item.title: Donald Tusk announces military training plan for all Polish men
item.description: Poland's prime minister said his government plans to have a model ready by the end of the year.
